mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id cartId, c.member_id memberId, c.product_id productId, s.stock_id stockId, p.product_name productName, p.price price, c.quantity quantity, sl.seller_name sellerName, option_price optionPrice, discount_percent discountPercent, delivery_cost deliveryCost, s.option_detail_id optionDetailId, s.option_detail_id2 optionDetailId2,pi.save_name save_name FROM cart c JOIN member m ON m.member_id = c.member_id JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_img pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id JOIN stock s ON c.stock_id = s.stock_id JOIN seller sl ON p.seller_id = sl.seller_id WHERE pi.sequence = 1 AND m.member_id = #{memberId}
